newsitem.title: USA: Insignia Financial ends merger talks.
newsitem.headline: Insignia Financial ends merger talks.

text.p: Insignia Financial Group Inc and Related Capital Co said on Wednesday they had terminated discussions regarding the potential acquisition of Related Capital by Insignia.
Related Capital's businesses required that the two companies reach definitive merger terms prior to a deadline, the companies said. The date of the deadline was not immediately available.
The companies reported that material issues remained outstanding as of that date and therefore a determination was made to terminate the discussions, the companies said.
Insignia said several months ago that it felt that it had reached agreement on the basic terms of three potential acquisitions, with Related Capital being the largest.
Despite the termination of negotiations with Related Capital, Insignia said its acquisition pipeline continues to be active.
